titles.title: Hail Glorious Head Of All Thine Own (easy nice

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hail glorious Head of all Thine own Our equal cause of peace and pow'r Thou for our sins didst once atone Thou art our life of life this hour{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}On Thee were our transgressions laid On Thee the Law's pure lightnings shed The member's debt of doom was paid By unknown sufferings of the Head{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And now in toil temptation strife Still from their Head's exhaustless well The members draw new streams of life The world the flesh the fiend to quell{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Deep through the springs of mind and soul Thee the great Comforter inspires Thy sovereign thoughts our thought control Thy love our love divinely fire{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}To know to do the Head's commands For this the Body lives and grows All speed of feet and skill of hands For Thee is spent and from Thee flows{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Then Lord in strong communion still Oh faster bind us to be free Thou working out by us Thy will We working out Thy will by Thee{/lang-eng}
